Name: Cantaritos
Glass: Cantaritos clay pot or Collins glass
Ingredients: 60 ml Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Cantaritos clay pot or Collins glass .
If using a Cantaritos clay pot (instead of a collins glass) submerge the pot in cold water to clean the inside and wet the outside clay.
POUR ingredients into ice-filled pot or glass.
Review: Juicy (freshly squeezed orange, grapefruit and lime) and refreshing slightly salty tequila invigorated with sparkling grapefruit soda. Wetting the porous clay exterior of the Cantaritos pot not only improves its appearance but as the water evaporates from the outside so it helps keep the contents cold.
History: Commonly made in bars, cafés and even roadside stalls of Jalisco, Mexico. The simple Cantaritos clay pot is often used as a disposable take away container.
